dataList.title: Kumarhane
dataList.desc:
Ayazlı havanın altında, Vergilius bir sonraki durağımızı tanıtıyordu.
Yeni Altın Dal nerede olabilirdi ki?

dataList.title: Rehineci Dükkanı
dataList.desc:
Faust görevimizi açıklıladı:
İlk adım olarak, belli bir “Regineci Dükkanı”na uğramalıydık.

dataList.title: Su Geçirmez Plan
dataList.desc:
Temizlik departmanından bir ikili ile birlikte görev alacakmışız.
Günahkârlar üstünlük taslamalarına ayar oluyorlardı…

dataList.title: Hödük
dataList.desc:
Su geçirmez planın tek bir zafı vardı.
Don Quixote’nin ani çakışması bizleri TingTang Çetesi ile yüz yüze getiriyordu…

dataList.title: Fev-i Su'yumuz Limbu―
dataList.desc: TingTang kodamanlarıyla olan savaş sürmekte. Ardı arkası kesilmiyor, onların bölgesinde olduğumuzu belli ediyordu.

dataList.title: Araba Pogadası
dataList.desc:
Sorguladığımız üyeye göre liderleri eski bir hurdalıktaymış.
B planı olarak TingTang Çetesi'nin kiyafetlerini ve 'Şans'ını çalıcağız.

dataList.title: Dilek Kutusu
dataList.desc: The team searches around the car pagodas looking for the Tingtang Gang’s boss.

dataList.title: Slot Makineleri
dataList.desc: After a series of scuffles, we relieved the Tingtang Gang of their outfits and made our way into the casino. This time, we’ll succeed for sure.

dataList.title: A Performance
dataList.desc: Our newfound determination is swept away in a torrent of glitter, along with our backup plan. There are plenty of obstacles to overcome—particularly the security guards who just noticed us.

dataList.title: BOK
dataList.desc: We reached the second floor of the casino. It makes me dizzy imagining what troubles await.

dataList.title: Ağzının Ortasına BOK
dataList.desc: We encountered another Syndicate that has a stake in this casino.

dataList.title: Baile y Rola
dataList.desc: The enthusiasm is in stark contrast to the atmosphere just a floor below. One can find a series of unknown musical instruments on every table. What are they for?

dataList.title: A Warm Welcome
dataList.desc: Thanks to Sinclair’s astonishing performance, we could reach the third floor. Our joy was short-lived as an imposing Syndicate was waiting for us there.

dataList.title: An Overstayed Welcome
dataList.desc: Thanks to Sinclair’s astonishing performance, we could reach the third floor. Our joy was short-lived as an imposing Syndicate was waiting for us there.

dataList.title: Gobsmack
dataList.desc: The Sinners were growing weary from the prolonged encounter with the Tieqiu Crew. One of them in particular…

dataList.title: Contestants
dataList.desc: Ryōshū’s unexpected lesson in incredible violence opened a way to the top floor at the cost of our inner peace. Now we must win the Golden Bough in a game of chance.

dataList.title: Stop Right There
dataList.desc: Rodya nominated herself to play the game. The table was reaching its final round.

dataList.title: The Winner
dataList.desc: Curious to know what was happening, we eavesdropped on the table. We barge in by accident to find a spatter of blood, the compressed remains of the Tieqiu Boss, and a man named Sonya giving us a soft smile.

dataList.title: Branch J-03
dataList.desc: Rodya emerged victorious. Now we must descend to the underground floors to lay our claim on the Golden Bough.
